dsl_rule: ASSOCIATED(field1, field2, 'CSI-RS is located in the bandwidth part defined by BWP-Id')
predicate: The scramblingID in csi-measconfig_nzp-csi-rs-resourcetoaddmodlist is associated with the bwp-id in initialdownlinkbwp_pdsch-config, indicating that the configured CSI-RS is located in the bandwidth part defined by BWP-Id.

valid: If scramblingID is set, bwp-id must be set to define the bandwidth part where the CSI-RS is located.
invalid: If scramblingID is set, but bwp-id is not set or does not define the bandwidth part where the CSI-RS is located.

notes: The evidence explicitly states that the BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig (which corresponds to field2) defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS (which corresponds to field1) is located in. This indicates an association between the two fields across the IEs.

meta.evidence: - scramblingID defines scrambling ID of CSI-RS with length of 10 bits. - BWP-Id in CSI-ResourceConfig defines which bandwidth part the configured CSI-RS is located in.
